biotools.summary: The goal of SizeExtractR is to facilitate scientific projects that have research questions relating to size, from pure biology to ecology on individual to landscape scales, by providing a protocol with a user-friendly set of interactive tools for image analysis (ImageJ-macros) and database formation and quality checking (R-package).

bioschemas.name: SizeExtractR
